DuringResearchShidoTalk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>So...<sp:5:1:0> The stone slate Jiahto was
researching had that written on it.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The land of the sky fish... Floating rocks
with a floating droplet among them...
and the <clr:0000>mark of the king<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>This mystery only deepens.<sp:5:1:0> Hmm.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>I truly wish that I could be of some use
to you.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Link!<sp:5:1:0> My dearest friend! Is there anything
you would like to inquire about?

Ask me whatever your heart desires, and I
shall do all I can to help.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>What?! You say my father was attacked by
a monster?

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Angry_01>And that Princess Zelda unleashed it upon
him? <sp:5:1:0>What could that possibly mean?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Well, for now I fear all we can do is take
my father at his word and try not to let
our concern overcome us.
<snd:Happy_01>Link, <sp:5:1:0>thank you for telling me about
my father.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Princess Zelda descending from the sky,
not to mention the monster and that filthy
sludge...<sp:5:0:0> It seems our course is skyward.
We now know that the mark of the king<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
written of on the slate refers to my
father's scale.
The only remaining mystery is that of the
<clr:0000>land of the sky fish <clr:ffff>and the<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>floating rock
in the shape of a <clr:0000>droplet<clr:ffff>...
Stand upon the<clr:0000> land of the sky fish<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
That must be referring to an actual
location of some sort.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Determination_00>I am sure that if we locate the <clr:0000>land of
the sky fish<clr:ffff>, it will lead us to the floating
rock that is in the shape of a <clr:0000>droplet<clr:ffff>!
Link, if you find any leads, please let me
know at once.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Link! Is there anything else you would like
to ask me?
DuringResearchShidoTalk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Is there anything else you would like to
ask me?
DuringResearchShidoTalk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>I have tasked the historian Jiahto with
investigating the ruin fragments and any
history books regarding the sky.
If you believe that Princess Zelda's
whereabouts are related to the floating
islands or the ruins, speak with him.
I believe Jiahto is currently conducting
his investigation at <clr:0000>Toto Lake<clr:ffff>, which is
northwest of here.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_24:
Have you, perchance, been to the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>, which you can see
just over yonder?
Purah asked me to allow her to build it in
order to create a map. Naturally, I did not
hesitate to allow it.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Link!<sp:5:1:0> My dearest friend! Is there anything
you would like to inquire about?

Ask me whatever your heart desires, and I
shall do all I can to help.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>This is truly a burden...


<sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm using my ability to manipulate
water to separate the clean water
from the sludge.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>If I cease, the dirty water will flow into the
domain and cause everyone to suffer.

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:ShidoClench_00>That is why I cannot leave this place,
no matter what.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I do not quite understand how she plans
to use it to create a map, but...I am sure
she knows what she is doing.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:ShidoAizuchi_00>The mountains around here are
dangerous, so it would be most
useful for you to have a map.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Embarrassed_01>Lady Yona? She is...<sp:5:1:0>my dearest childhood
companion. And much more. <sp:5:1:0>She is also
my fiancée. My intended. My bride-to-be.
There was a time when we saw each other
often, but life got in the way, as it does.
Time has certainly gotten away from us.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I recall our childhood days with utmost
fondness, and at last, she has come to
visit for the first time in a while. And yet...
I must admit I have been a tad awkward
around her. Due to the situation at hand,
we have barely spoken since she arrived.
She has been an immense help in easing
our struggle here.<sp:5:0:0> I am so grateful for
her kindness.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_27:
Have you, perchance, been to the
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>, which you can see
just over yonder?
Purah asked me to allow her to build it in
order to create a map. Naturally, I did not
hesitate to allow it.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>I see!


It was good seeing you, Link. If you find
something, or if you need anything at all,
know that I am always here for you.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I do not quite understand how she plans
to use it to create a map, but...I am sure
she knows what she is doing.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:ShidoAizuchi_00>The mountains around here are
dangerous, so it would be most
useful for you to have a map.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> If it isn't the Zora armor!


That armor really is perfect on you,
my friend!<sp:5:1:0> I am sure it will aid you in
your search for Princess Zelda.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:ShidoAizuchi_00>Speaking of the lost princess...<sp:5:0:0> It is
possible that something I know may
be of use to you.
If you have something you would like to
ask me about, do not hesitate to let
me know!
DuringResearchShidoTalk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Is there anything else you would like to
ask me?
DuringResearchShidoTalk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>mark of the king<clr:ffff>, eh... I am sorry,
but I have no idea what that could be.

As Jiahto often tells me, when in doubt,
ask my father. He is not the beloved Zora
king for nothing, after all.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>He left the domain to investigate the
sludge. That is all I know.<sp:5:0:0> I am hopeful
that he will return soon.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Determination_00>Perhaps you could try visiting the
<clr:0000>throne room<clr:ffff>. As you may recall,
it is in the center of the domain.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> That is the Zora armor!


It really is perfect on you.<sp:5:1:0> I have no doubt
that it will help you in your search for
Princess Zelda!
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:ShidoAizuchi_00>Speaking of...<sp:5:0:0> Have you found anything?
DuringResearchShidoTalk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>It is filthy, that much is certain.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>With my ability to manipulate water,
I have been separating the clean water
from the sludge.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>If I cease what I am doing, the filthy water
will flow into our domain and cause much
suffering for the Zora.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:ShidoClench_00>That is why I cannot leave this place,
no matter what.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Embarrassed_01>Lady Yona? She is...<sp:5:1:0> Well...my fiancée.
My intended. My bride-to-be.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>We were quite close when we were
children. I remember those days with
utmost fondness.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>I must admit I have been a tad awkward
around her. <sp:5:1:0>We were apart for so long, yet
we have barely spoken since she arrived.<sp:5:1:0>
Now she is lending a kind hand at the
domain because of our current situation.
And I...<sp:5:1:0> I can't bring myself to face her.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ah! Will you look at that.<sp:5:0:0> Your Zora armor
is finally back where it belongs.

I must say, that armor really is perfect on
you!<sp:5:1:0> I am certain that it will prove useful
for your investigation.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Speaking of...<sp:5:1:0> I have been thinking about
what we know at this point.

We now know that the mark of the king
written of on the slate refers to my
father's scale.
The only remaining mystery is that of the
floating rock in the shape of a <clr:0000>droplet<clr:ffff>
found in the <clr:0000>land of the sky fish<clr:ffff>.
If it is called the land of the sky fish...<sp:5:1:0>
That must be referring to an actual
location of some sort.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Determination_00>I am sure that if we locate the <clr:0000>land of
the sky fish<clr:ffff>, it will lead us to the floating
rock that is in the shape of a <clr:0000>droplet<clr:ffff>!
Link, if you find any leads, please let me
know at once.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Link!<sp:5:0:0> It is brutal being unable to help you
with your investigation. Still, please do let
me know if you make any headway!
DuringResearchShidoTalk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>I see!


It was good seeing you, Link. If you find
something, or if you need anything at all,
know that I am always here for you.
DuringResearchShidoTalk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Ah, Link!<sp:5:1:0> Have you made any progress
in your search for Princess Zelda?

The only remaining mystery is that of the

If it is called the land of the sky fish...

Link, if you find any leads, please let me
